html:
Howâ€™s your Christmas shopping coming along? I hope you arenâ€™t having to brave the crowds in these last couple days. Have I ever told you that one of my least favorite things on Earth â€” ON EARTH â€” is parking lots at Christmas?

Not. A. Fan.

Man, the Costco parking lot by my house? Or, rather, any Costco parking lot in any town in America at Christmas? How can it take 20 minutes for my car to move 20 feet?

Ladybugs on the ground are passing my car.

A snail that hitched a ride on my car overnight literally climbed back down to the road because it knew it could go faster. ðŸ˜‚

But I digressâ€¦

Tabs loved Christmases, but it was easy for him because he was the boss, whereas Iâ€™m the one who had to do all the jobs. I had to decorate the office, make all the ornaments, get all the gifts, schedule all the cat spa services. It was a lot!

Thankfully, Rosie is more chill about Christmas. She pretty much sticks to her own agenda.

Like, by studying meteorologyâ€¦

And astronomy! In fact, sheâ€™s pretty sure she found something new in the night skyâ€¦

Earlier this month, she interned with the largest toy manufacturer north of the Arctic Circle. She said it was very interesting and rewarding.

Marnie just loves everything that isnâ€™t scary, so sheâ€™s having a great holiday season.

Thatâ€™s one of the great things about Marnie. Sheâ€™s very easy to please.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addicts,

Karen, Marnie and Rosie
